results.title: A bill to designate the medical center of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Huntington, West Virginia, as the Hershel "Woody" Williams VA Medical Center.
results.short_title: A bill to designate the medical center of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Huntington, West Virginia, as the Hershel "Woody" Williams VA Medical Center.
results.latest_major_action: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
results.summary: This bill designates the medical center of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Huntington, West Virginia, as the "Hershel `Woody' Williams VA Medical Center."
results.summary_short: This bill designates the medical center of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Huntington, West Virginia, as the "Hershel `Woody' Williams VA Medical Center."

actions.description: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent. (text: CR S5078)
Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S5078)
Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
